explanation: [0-0] A man in a gray apron and black gloves stands in the kitchen, wearing a black short-sleeved shirt, holding a box of blue EXTREME HEAT food packaging.

[0-3] The man places the EXTREME HEAT food packaging box on a wooden table and proceeds to stack more EXTREME HEAT food packaging boxes on top of each other, forming a column. The EXTREME HEAT food packaging box column grows taller and taller, eventually becoming a tower that topples over toward the screen. The scene then changes to the man holding a package of dried chili peppers with both hands. He then uses a knife in his right hand to cut open the package, tears it open with both hands, takes out the dried chili peppers, and breaks them into pieces.

[0-3] The man places the EXTREME HEAT food packaging box on a wooden table and proceeds to stack more EXTREME HEAT food packaging boxes on top of each other, forming a column. The EXTREME HEAT food packaging box column grows taller and taller, eventually becoming a tower that topples over toward the screen. The scene then changes to the man holding a package of dried chili peppers with both hands. He then uses a knife in his right hand to cut open the package, tears it open with both hands, takes out the dried chili peppers, and breaks them into pieces.

The scene then changes to the man holding a package of dried chili peppers with both hands. He then uses a knife in his right hand to cut open the package, tears it open with both hands, takes out the dried chili peppers, and breaks them into pieces.

[3-7] The scene changes again, with gloved hands lifting a pot of clear water. A handful of dried chili peppers is then added to the pot. Next, an onion is held in front of the screen and cut in half with a small knife. One half of the onion is then picked up, and the outer layer is peeled off. Following that, a large garlic clove is cut in half with a small knife. Then, three tomatoes are taken off a tomato vine, lined up, and cut in half. A green pepper is then placed on the wooden board and sliced in half with one cut.

[7-10] The scene shifts to the man placing a square baking dish on the table and adding the chopped onions, garlic, green peppers, and tomatoes into the dish. He then lifts the baking dish, and the scene immediately changes to the man holding a cloth and lifting the baking dish to show the baked tomatoes, green peppers, garlic, and onions. The scene changes again, with the man pouring the dried chili peppers from the pot into a blender. Another younger man appears in the frame and adds the baked food from the baking dish into the blender as well. Then, they turn on the blender, both holding it with their hands and looking up at the ceiling. The food inside the blender turns into a red mixture of juice and residue. Next, the man on the left picks up a frying pan, while the man on the right presses a piece of beef onto the pan.

[10-18] The scene changes again to a frying pan containing cooked ground beef. A hand pours the sauce from the blender onto the meat. Then, the scene shifts back to the two men standing in front of the table, with the older man on the left wearing black gloves and a gray apron, and the younger man on the right wearing black gloves and a black apron. They take turns patting square pieces of cheese onto the table. The camera then zooms in to show the pile of cheese on the table, which is then transferred into a black pot. A can is then shown to the camera, and a can opener is used to open it, revealing a white liquid inside. The white liquid is then poured into the pot with the cheese. The scene then switches to an avocado on the table being cut in half with a small knife, and the pit is removed with the knife. Next, a handful of cilantro is chopped with a kitchen knife. The scene changes again, focusing on a red onion being cut in half with a small knife, followed by the onion being peeled. The scene shifts once more to chopped onions and cilantro on a wooden board, which are then picked up by a pair of hands.
